name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. James E. NIXON, Sr., Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. James E. NIXON, Sr., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of April, 2009, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
969 A.2d 1178
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. James E. NIXON, Sr., Petitioner.
No. 3 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 2, 2009.
